White Balancing

.

Description
..

Additionally the hardware applet enables a spectral adaptation of the image to the lighting situation of the application. The colour values for red and blue can be individually enhanced or reduced by a scaling factor to adjust the spectral sensibility of the camera sensor. The enhancement of the colour green is fixed as factor 1.0 and is the basic of the correction. The colour channels red and blue can be configured by the user.

Base configuration is supported. Please read the according chapter of the manual of your camera, which output format is used.


Parameters
.

White Balancing

It allows the spectrum adaptation of the image to the illumination of your application. The color values of the colors red and blue can be individually / will be automatically strengthen or reduced via a scaling factor just to compensate the spectral sensitivity. The strengthen of the color green is the basis of the correction and is normed to 1.0.

Using this functionality and pressing the corresponding button the program will determine the optimum values out of a grabbed image. To get a good result you should aim the camera onto a white surface and then activate the white balancing.
